content: googly eye snail by tara womack 4mm hook googly eye ring 4 weight yarn pipe cleaner for feelers start with slip knot attach to ring with a slip st chain 3 chain 3 counts as st 15dc around ring slip st behind eyes to top of chain 3 16 double_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet in first 2 st half_double_crochet 2together half_double_crochet in next 2 st half_double_crochet 2together around slip_stitch to 1st st 12 half_double_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet 2together half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet 2together around join to 1st st 8hdc chain 1 single_crochet in each st around 8sc mark first st with st marker do not join continue working in the round with single_crochet in each st until there are 81 single_crochet row about 21 inches long leave about 15 inch tail f/o now start to roll tacking as you wrap to hold shape secure neck tuck tail add pipe cleaner if you want
